content.question: Which of the following best describes the roles of women in the rural, agricultural economies of sub-Saharan Africa?

choices.label: Salaried workers in large-scale commercial agriculture
Nonwage workers on small, family-run farms
Hourly workers in seasonal migratory farm work
Drivers and operators of agricultural equipment

content.answer: Nonwage workers on small, family-run farms

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
